titles: The confutation of the abbote of Crosraguels masse, set furth by Maister George Hay ...
author: Hay, George, d. 1588.
publisher: By Robert Lekpreuik, and are to be sauld at his hous at the nether Bow. Cum priuilegio,
notes: Prints and answers excerpts of a MS. treatise.--STC.

Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
